intension: Design an invitation for a free software development seminar that will take place from September 16th to September 20th. The seminar will cover topics related to coding, programming, digital technology, web development and data. The event is illustrated with a purple woman on the front.
globalcaption: The image features a cartoon woman sitting on a chair and using a laptop computer. She appears to be focused on her work or enjoying some form of digital entertainment. The laptop is placed on her lap, and she is holding a mouse in her hand. The scene is set in a room with a couch in the background, and a cell phone can be seen on a surface nearby.
keywords: code, data, development, digital, it, program, programming, software, technology, web, tb, tbo, education, learn, laptop, computer, online, coding, programmer, course, class, smart, tech, training, learning, studying, woman, illustration, purple, invitation

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a person sitting on a chair, holding a laptop computer in their lap. The person appears to be focused on the laptop screen, possibly working or browsing the internet. The chair they are sitting on is positioned in the center of the image, with the laptop occupying a significant portion of the scene
